lead_paragraph: The two Women’s World Cup matches scheduled for yesterday were postponed for a day because of a typhoon. The Canada-Australia Group C match in Chengdu, China, and the China-New Zealand Group D match in Tianjin will both be played today. That will allow them to be played simultaneously with the other final group matches set for today — Norway vs. Ghana in Group C and Brazil vs. Denmark in Group D.All four games are critical and will determine which four teams advance to the quarterfinals. Of the eight teams, only Ghana has no chance to advance.
